job.title: Senior Embedded Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtSenior Embedded Software Engineer ltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtLocationltstronggt San Francisco Bay Area  Flexible hybrid onsiteremote scheduleltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtOpportunity to join an innovative tech company within the Autonomous Vehicle space working on full lifecycle Software Development for the companys next generation productsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAs a Senior Software Engineer you will be responsible for developing reliable C EmbeddedLinux Software to a high standard set by the company and industryltpgtltpgtThis will involve all stages from early development of prototypes through to testing and ensuring manufacturability of the final productsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe company have some very ambitious growth plans making this a great time to join for your personal career developmentltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe ideal candidate will have experience inltpgtltulgtltligtWorking in Embedded systems environmentltligtltligtExtensive CC developmentltligtltligtLinux developmentltligtltligtYocto experience is desirableltligtltligtDegree in relevant disciplineltligtltulgtltpgtYou will be working closely with the Hardware team ElectricalPCB design Engineers so a basic understanding of reading schematics and board layout would be desirableltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe company offer a very competitive compensation as well as a comprehensive benefits packageltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtIf youre looking for a new challenge and a chance to progress you skills and career further APPLY nowltpgt
